testcase.name: User can login into Free CRM using valid credential
testcase.system-out: Given user standing into login page.........................................passed When for successful search enter user details as "nivmother@gmail.com" and "Test@123".passed Then user successfully Login into Home page.................................passed

testcase.name: User can't login into Free CRM using invalid credential
testcase.system-out: Given user standing into login page.........................................passed When for unsuccessful search enter user details as "nivmother@gmail.com" and "Test@12".passed Then user remain in Login page..............................................passed And User received error message as Something went Wrong and "Invalid login".passed

testcase.name: User can't login into Free CRM using invalid credential 2
testcase.system-out: Given user standing into login page.........................................passed When for unsuccessful search enter user details as "nivmother@gmail.com" and "".passed Then user remain in Login page..............................................passed And User received error message as Something went Wrong and "Invalid request".passed
